Organization based in.content:

Paragraph: EA2605165294 Nairobi KNA in English 0945 GMT 26 May 94

| Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| EA2605165294 | Nairobi | Yes |
| KNA | Nairobi | Yes |

Explanation:

* EA2605165294 is an organization that is based in Nairobi.
* KNA (Kenya National Assembly) is an organization that is based in Nairobi.

The pattern indicating this relationship is the mention of the location (Nairobi) in the text followed by the name of the organization.
